channel.title: Starter changing [WinterLove]
channel.description: Hello I just wanna ask how I change the starter equipment on a WinterLove base as im being done today with. If you know, can you please reply it.

item.title: Starter changing [WinterLove]
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

go to your player.java i don’t remmber java and search one of the items.
Keep on searching if it doesn’t come up with a lot of items. this is what mine looks like

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1149; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6568; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3122; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=6922; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6920; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Read full topic
